Text:
Just wanted to say thank you so very much for uploading this riveting show! I really appreciate the fact that you went to the trouble to share this, with the great BBC subtitles..Every episode is of a very high quality.. and I also appreciate that you uploaded the entire series (perfectly).

I note that you've also uploaded Deadwood, by the way, which just goes to show that you're a person of excellent taste :-) 

So cheers - and once again, thank you!
Fangular
Not to mention the fact you're also a Better Off Ted fan, apparently.. what a brilliant show that was, so cruelly stopped before its time!
